basics.headline: Assistant to the Regional Manager
basics.name: Dwight Schrute
basics.summary: Top-performing paper salesman and beet farmer known for relentless work ethic, encyclopedic policy knowledge, and unconventional (yet effective) leadership tactics. Expert in prospecting, territory defense, risk mitigation, and farm-to-table operations.

organization.name: Dunder Mifflin Scranton Branch
organization.description: Regional office of a mid-sized paper company serving Northeastern Pennsylvania.

employments.summary: Senior sales specialist and second-in-command, supporting branch leadership while managing enterprise accounts and training new reps.
highlights: Consistently top 1–2 in quarterly sales across the company
Developed a rapid-response client retention playbook used branch-wide
Instituted emergency readiness drills improving evacuation times
Led temporary command during crises, maintaining sales continuity

references.name: Michael Scott
references.testimonial: Dwight is loyal, fearless, and weirdly effective. If I needed someone to sell paper and defend the office at the same time, it’s Dwight.

employments.summary: Acting branch leader overseeing operations, sales targets, and staff performance.
highlights: Exceeded quarterly revenue target by optimizing territory assignments
Implemented structured ride-alongs and call reviews for skills uplift
Standardized sales desk readiness and prospecting cadences

initiatives.summary: Scaled Schrute Farms from a family beet farm into a niche agritourism destination offering farm stays, table dinners, and seasonal events.
highlights: Increased annual bookings by 60% through off-season experiences
Built direct-to-consumer channel with recurring produce subscriptions
Established safety and guest SOPs cutting incident rate to near zero
initiatives.name: Schrute Farms Agritourism Expansion

references.name: Angela Martin
references.testimonial: Meticulous books, uncompromising standards, and surprisingly delightful beet-based experiences.

certificates.name: CPR/AED Certification
certificates.summary: Certified in adult and child CPR and AED usage; maintains annual refreshers.

publications.name: The Definitive Field Guide to Beets (Northeast Edition)
publications.summary: A practical handbook covering varietals, soil prep, pest deterrence, and harvest logistics—optimized for small-scale commercial beet operations.

interests.name: Survivalism
interests.summary: Preparedness, shelter building, and resource planning.
